EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-Partner-Teleprospecting-IDG teleprospect-T001XB.e.Email - EN2 NAM
EmailTemplate.subject: Achieve a payback of less than 24 months with a private optical network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Achieve a payback of less than 24 months with a private optical network Discover why a private optical network could be just what you need to meet today’s digital demands
Enterprises need to rapidly scale up bandwidth to meet changing business needs. Dark fiber provides the scalability enterprises need to connect data centers and build a private cloud. Building a private optical network with dark fiber often has a lower monthly recurring charge and can achieve a payback of less than 24 months when compared to buying carrier services. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
